wikipedia_page.main: Peter Marshall Fraser,  (6 April 1918 – 15 September 2007) was a classical scholar and historian specialising in the Hellenistic age of Greece. He was a Fellow of All Souls College, Oxford and acting Warden of the college from 1985 to 1987. He served as Director of the British School at Athens from 1968 to 1971.

response: Peter Fraser (1884–1950) was prime minister of New Zealand from 1940 to 1949.
Peter Fraser may also refer to:
* Peter Fraser (Northwest Territories politician) (1921–2000), Canadian politician
* Peter Fraser (merchant) (1765–1840), merchant and politician in New Brunswick
* Peter Fraser, Baron Fraser of Carmyllie (1945–2013), Scottish politician and advocate
* Peter Fraser, fictional character on the Australian soap opera Home and Away
* Peter Fraser (judge), British barrister and judge
